Key Match Events: Chris Flexen pitched a gem, leading the White Sox to a 7-0 victory and completing a three-game sweep over the Angels
Post-Match Reflections: The White Sox drew 15,678 fans for their final home game of the season, with an average of 17,928 per game for the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox entered the series with 120 defeats, tied with the 1962 Mets for the highest total in the Modern Era (since 1901)
Others: The White Sox avoided losing their 121st game of the season, maintaining the same total as they departed for their final series of the season in Detroit
